articles.author: Mike Allen
articles.title: Bessent confirmation: Trump's Treasury pick to tout "new economic golden age" - Axios
articles.description: "My life has been the 'only in America' story that I am determined to preserve for future generations," he will say.
articles.content: Scott Bessent,President-elect Trump's pick for Treasury, will tell the Senate Finance Committee at his confirmation hearing Thursday that he sees "a generational opportunity to unleash a new economic… [+1342 chars]
